name: Peter Berg
description:
After acclaimed director Peter Berg adapted the board game Battleship to a movie about... well, battleships (and aliens?!), we can't help but think... what about other classic board games?

An evil land developer (Steve Buscemi) has everything: a fancy car, a top hat, and a large bag of money. But he wants more! When he destroys the house of a local construction worker (Chris Pratt), it's time for action. Armed with his wheelbarrow and his trusty dog (a dog), can Pratt and his thimble-wearing seamstress fiance (Elizabeth Banks) topple the slumlord and build the hotel of their dreams? It's... "Monopoly"!

A brother (Tom Holland) and sister (Cara Delevingne) are sucked into a magical vortex. They are transported to a strange land, where candy grows on trees and rivers of chocolate flow. They are tasked with the quest: find the missing King Kandy (Kevin Kline). Can they escape the evil Lord Licorice (Clive Owen) and befriend the lovely Princess Lolly (Anne Hathaway)? Beware, things are not as they seem in... "Candy Land"!

Africa is struck by a famine! Four best friends: a hippo (Adam Sandler), a hippo (David Spade), a hippo (Rob Schneider), and a hippo (Kevin James) have nothing to eat! Can they find food or will they starve? Hilarity and hijinks ensue in... "Hungry Hungry Hippos"!

Oh, crap. They all have been optioned for movies already. Yes, even the hippos...
